nano-banana.description: Google Gemini 2.5 Flash Image (gemini-2.5-flash-image) - flat rate pricing. Based on official Google Gemini API pricing: approximately $0.039 per image (1,290 tokens for 1024x1024 images).

pricing_notes.token_consumption: 1,290 tokens per image output up to 1024x1024 pixels

nano-banana-pro.description: Google Gemini 3 Pro Image Preview (gemini-3-pro-image-preview) - resolution-based pricing. Based on official Google Gemini API pricing: 1K/2K images cost $0.134/image, 4K images cost $0.24/image.

pricing_notes.1K: Based on $0.134 per image (1120 tokens at $120/1M tokens output + $0.0011 input)
pricing_notes.2K: Based on $0.134 per image (1120 tokens at $120/1M tokens output + $0.0011 input)
pricing_notes.4K: Based on $0.24 per image (2000 tokens at $120/1M tokens output + $0.0011 input)

flux-1-kontext-pro.description: FLUX.1 Kontext Pro - mode-based pricing. Pricing varies by generation mode (text2image, image2image, fusion). Based on BFL/Azure pricing structure.

flux-2-pro.description: FLUX.2 [PRO] - dynamic pricing based on output resolution (megapixels) and input images. Pricing scales with megapixels generated. Based on BFL official pricing: text2image starts at $0.03/image, image editing starts at $0.045/edit.

pricing_notes.base: Base pricing: text2image $0.03/image, image editing $0.045/edit. Cost scales with megapixels (width × height / 1M).
pricing_notes.input_images: Input images increase cost. Multi-image mode uses higher base cost.

flux-2-flex.description: FLUX.2 [FLEX] - dynamic pricing based on output resolution (megapixels) and input images. Pricing scales with megapixels generated. Based on BFL official pricing: text2image starts at $0.06/image, image editing starts at $0.12/edit.

pricing_notes.base: Base pricing: text2image $0.06/image, image editing $0.12/edit. Cost scales with megapixels (width × height / 1M).
pricing_notes.input_images: Input images increase cost. Multi-image mode uses higher base cost.

fallback.description: Default fallback pricing for unknown models
